TASKS.title: Fix EventList.tsx SSE - Replace EventSource with useAdminSSE hook
TASKS.current_problem: Line 116: Manual EventSource instantiation bypasses hook, duplicates connection logic, no automatic reconnection

solution.step_1_read_hook: Read /home/veranoby/sports-bets/frontend/src/hooks/useSSE.ts lines 361-405 to understand useAdminSSE hook API
solution.step_2_verify_imports: Verify useAdminSSE is exported from useSSE.ts (line 361: 'export function useAdminSSE')
solution.step_3_find_manual_eventsource: Find manual EventSource creation around line 116 in EventList.tsx
solution.step_4_replace_with_hook: Replace manual EventSource with: const adminSSE = useAdminSSE(AdminChannel.GLOBAL);
solution.step_5_add_import: Add to imports at top of file: import { useAdminSSE, AdminChannel, SSEEventType } from '../../hooks/useSSE';
solution.step_6_update_handlers: Update event handlers to use adminSSE.subscribe() instead of eventSource.addEventListener()
solution.step_7_cleanup: Remove manual eventSource.close() cleanup - hook handles it automatically

TASKS.title: Fix LiveEvent.tsx SSE - Replace EventSource with useSSE hook

SOURCE_VERIFICATION_PROTOCOL.rule: BEFORE using/destructuring any property from external source (hook, component, API), READ the source definition to verify EXACT property names
SOURCE_VERIFICATION_PROTOCOL.example_correct: Read useSSE.ts ‚Üí See 'isLoading' not 'loading' ‚Üí Use const { isLoading } = useSSE()
SOURCE_VERIFICATION_PROTOCOL.example_wrong: Assume 'loading' exists ‚Üí const { loading } = useSSE() ‚Üí undefined at runtime
SOURCE_VERIFICATION_PROTOCOL.enforcement: Read source file, note exact names, then use them. NO assumptions.

SIMULATE_Y_CONFIRMAR_PROTOCOL.step_1_simulate: Before editing, describe EXACTLY what will change: file, lines, imports, dependencies
SIMULATE_Y_CONFIRMAR_PROTOCOL.step_2_confirm: Verify against actual codebase: Does file exist? Are imports available? Will this break anything?
SIMULATE_Y_CONFIRMAR_PROTOCOL.failure_action: If simulation reveals problem ‚Üí REPORT it, do NOT attempt fix outside scope
